item.title: Let's get Go-ing
item.description: Why Go? Computer evolution more cores programming languages based on one core programming Programming workflow evolution not written by single developer written at different times programmers write library or package to be used elsewhere open source code needs to be shared Go rethinks object-oriented development allows for code reuse let’s you use all cores no need to recompile evrytime. Learn concurrency model fast compiler syntax type system concurrency channels testing, etc How Modern programming challenges Go away Currently choice between rapid development : Ruby, python fast execution : C, C++.
